org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.operators

类 GenericWriteAheadSink<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators.AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.operators.GenericWriteAheadSink<IN>
  • 类型参数:
    IN - Type of the elements emitted by this sink
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, KeyContext, OneInputStreamOperator<IN,IN>, StreamOperator<IN>
    直接已知子类:
    CassandraRowWriteAheadSink, CassandraTupleWriteAheadSink

    public abstract class GenericWriteAheadSink<IN>
extends AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
implements OneInputStreamOperator<IN,IN>
    Generic Sink that emits its input elements into an arbitrary backend. This sink is integrated with Flink's checkpointing mechanism and can provide exactly-once guarantees; depending on the storage backend and sink/committer implementation.

    Incoming records are stored within a AbstractStateBackend, and only committed if a checkpoint is completed.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

        参数:

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • open

        public void open()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStreamOperator
        This method is called immediately before any elements are processed, it should contain the operator's initialization logic, e.g. state initialization.

        The default implementation does nothing.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 StreamOperator<IN>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - An exception in this method causes the operator to fail.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStreamOperator
        This method is called after all records have been added to the operators via the methods OneInputStreamOperator.processElement(StreamRecord), or TwoInputStreamOperator.processElement1(StreamRecord) and TwoInputStreamOperator.processElement2(StreamRecord).

        The method is expected to flush all remaining buffered data. Exceptions during this flushing of buffered should be propagated, in order to cause the operation to be recognized asa failed, because the last data items are not processed properly.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 StreamOperator<IN>
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - An exception in this method causes the operator to fail.

      • saveHandleInState

        private void saveHandleInState(long checkpointId,
                               long timestamp)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Called when a checkpoint barrier arrives. It closes any open streams to the backend and marks them as pending for committing to the external, third-party storage system.
        参数:
        checkpointId - the id of the latest received checkpoint.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - in case something went wrong when handling the stream to the backend.
        java.lang.Exception

      • snapshotState

        public void snapshotState(StateSnapshotContext context)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStreamOperator
        Stream operators with state, which want to participate in a snapshot need to override this hook method.
        覆盖:
        snapshotState 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
        参数:
        context - context that provides information and means required for taking a snapshot
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • cleanRestoredHandles

        private void cleanRestoredHandles()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Called at open() to clean-up the pending handle list. It iterates over all restored pending handles, checks which ones are already committed to the outside storage system and removes them from the list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • notifyOfCompletedCheckpoint

        public void notifyOfCompletedCheckpoint(long checkpointId)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: StreamOperator
        Called when the checkpoint with the given ID is completed and acknowledged on the JobManager.
        指定者:
        notifyOfCompletedCheckpoint 在接口中 StreamOperator<IN>
        覆盖:
        notifyOfCompletedCheckpoint 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<IN>
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint that has been completed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions during checkpoint acknowledgement may be forwarded and will cause the program to fail and enter recovery.

      • sendValues

        protected abstract boolean sendValues(java.lang.Iterable<IN> values,
                                      long checkpointId,
                                      long timestamp)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Write the given element into the backend.
        参数:
        values - The values to be written
        checkpointId - The checkpoint ID of the checkpoint to be written
        timestamp - The wall-clock timestamp of the checkpoint
        返回:
        true, if the sending was successful, false otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
